#haglofs
Everyday has to be Earth Day

One year more in my life
(First time sharing my Bday 🎂here)
⋅
Hoy es de esos días que me apetece escribir en español, hoy es el dia en el que me apetece todavía más decir GRACIAS.
Y es que gracias a todas las personas que siguen mi trabajo en las redes sociales, comentan cada una de mis fotos, me regalan una sonrisa, que me animan a seguir trabajando duro, que me enseñan, me envían mensajes, aportan valor, me trasladan sus emociones...
Me haceis sentirme querido, y es el mayor regalo de cumpleaños que alguien puede tener.
Hoy, quiero compartir un abrazo contigo e invitarte a seguir viajando conmigo.
⋅
Picture by @neumarc in @mountainchaletghilga

The lone highland cattle ⋅
They originated in the Highlands and Western Isles of Scotland and were first mentioned in the 6th century AD. The first herd book described two distinct types of Highland cattle.
But, he's in a different place, in a cool place I would say... Found in Dolomites.

10, 20, 30... Miles and miles driving, more than 3000 feet of altitude, hikes, crossing woods, Tiredness, laughter.
When I travel, everyday I've different emotional situations, but this is my life, this is my work... So, I want to share this awesome spot!

#MovingYourWay

< Still planning >

I'm thinking on my next adventure and I've got good news for travelers like me: PayPal has released a cancellation insurance for travels. If you activate it and pay your tickets with PayPal, you don't have to worry anymore for unexpected issues, your insurance will cover them. So, if you need to cancel, PayPal will rembourse your money in 3 days with just one click.
Forget your excuses and start traveling!
⋅
Estoy pensando en mis próxima aventura y tengo una buena noticia para los viajeros incansables como yo: PayPal ha lanzado un Seguro de cancelación de viajes, que si lo activas y pagas tus billetes con PayPal, no tienes que preocuparte por los imprevistos, porque el seguro te los cubre. Vamos, que si tienes que cancelarlo, en un clic y 3 días, PayPal te reembolsa el importe.
Así que, venga, ya sí que no hay excusa para viajar!
#Aymiviaje @paypal

Few months ago we spend a lot of time planning a new trip...
This is the reason, enjoying freedom with friends.
#MovingYourWay

You have planned this trip for months. The luggage is ready to start your adventure. And right at the time you are walking out the door, your phone rings.
Your boss asks you to pospone your vacation.
Bye-bye trip, bye-bye adventure... I am not the only one to experience something similar.
Share your story using the hashtag #Aymiviaje and you can win 100€ with PayPal ⋅
Has estado meses planeando este viaje. El equipaje está listo para salir rumbo a la aventura.
Y en el momento en el que vas a salir por la puerta suena el teléfono. Tu jefa te pide que pospongas tus vacaciones.
Adiós viaje, adiós aventura… Seguro que no soy el único al que le ha pasado algo similar.
Comparte tu historia con el hashtag #AyMiViaje y podrás ganar 100€ con PayPal!

In the middle of a debate between analogical and digital supporters there is always time for a break to work on our arguments.
I brought some @corona into the meeting to show that, even when our positions are far one from another, we will always agree in some points. 
New year, new team... #thisisliving
